name: Harvest Bowl @\ii//__
description:
Those silly humans left some of their harvest behind. Take your little fox-rat self and collect that precious produce!

Mouse Controls (Original):

  • Hover your mouse to the left or right of the game window to steer your little rodential bowling ball.

Optional Keyboard Controls:

  • T = Toggle keyboard mode
  • W (or Up Arrow Key) = Press and hold to control speed meter at start
  • A/D (Arrow Keys) = add left right momentum to Foxy-Mouse-Ball
  • R = Reset Level
  • G = Return to Level Menu

Tip: Press and hold the “Press” button (or keyboard equivalent) to control your speed!

--------------------

Update 1-10-23 - Added the fullscreen button back in to the WebGL player as the mouse going off screen made it difficult to control. I also slowed the Speed charge a bit as it moved too fast for people to read it. Thanks for the feedback! Update 01-11-23 - Keyboard controls! My version of mouse-only controls appeared to be pretty unusable for a lot of players, so I added in a keyboard option. It still defaults to mouse-only for original experience, but now you can toggle keyboard mode with ‘T’. You do still have to use the mouse for the Level Menu, but everything else has a hotkey.

--------------------

Solo dev on this one! All graphics, models, textures, rigging, music, SFX and coding were done by me for this jam except for Tail Animator, Easy Save asset and bowling pin sound effects (which were from a sound pack I own). The non-standard font is Anagram by Nick’s Fonts and I got that from FontSquirrel.

LDJam link! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/harvest-bowl
